Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.enums.ImageMimeType

  • Packages that use ImageMimeType 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client
    Main package with all charts implementation, global classes and common interfaces.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.dom.elements
    Contains a set of DOM elements that Charba is using.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.enums
    Contains all enumerations of some chart options where only a specific set of values can be set.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.gwt.widgets
    Contains all charts classes wrapped as GWT widget in order to enable to use inside to GWT UIBinder.

    • Uses of ImageMimeType in org.pepstock.charba.client

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client with parameters of type ImageMimeType 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String AbstractChart.toBase64Image​(ImageMimeType type, double encoderOptions)
      Returns a base 64 encoded string of the chart in it's current state.
      default String IsChart.toBase64Image​(ImageMimeType type)
      Returns a data-URL containing a representation of the image format, passed as argument.
      The returned image is in a resolution of 96dpi and the image quality value is 0.92.
      String IsChart.toBase64Image​(ImageMimeType type, double encoderOptions)
      Returns a base 64 encoded string of the chart in it's current state.

    • Uses of ImageMimeType in org.pepstock.charba.client.dom.elements

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.dom.elements with parameters of type ImageMimeType 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String Canvas.toDataURL​(ImageMimeType type)
      Returns a data-URL containing a representation of the image format, passed as argument.
      The returned image is in a resolution of 96dpi and the image quality value is 0.92.
      String Canvas.toDataURL​(ImageMimeType type, double encoderOptions)
      Returns a data-URL containing a representation of the image format, passed as argument.
      The returned image is in a resolution of 96dpi.
